title: First teaser for FX/Hulu’s Kindred miniseries plays up the horror elements
description: Octavia Butler described her 1979 genre-busting bestseller as "a kind of grim fantasy."

title: FTX on brink of collapse after “liquidity crunch” at crypto exchange
description: Binance steps in with deal to rescue arch-rival after surge in withdrawals.

title: Slingboxes, streaming video way before it was cool, go dark tomorrow
description: The device that brought web-streaming TV to the masses will lose cloud support.

title: LG’s 27-inch OLED monitor is a $2,000 rarity
description: An OLED this size and this cheap is still uncommon for monitors.

title: Starlink to cap users at 1TB of high-speed data unless they pay extra
description: It'll be 25¢ per GB for additional high-speed data; overnight use doesn't count.

title: Ars has exclusive behind-the-scenes video from The Callisto Protocol
description: The next game from Dead Space's Glen Schofield is coming—and we filmed everything.

title: America’s slow-moving, confused crypto regulation is driving industry out of US
description: US is likely to end another year without clear guidance on digital assets.

title: NASA will leave its $4.1 billion rocket outside as Nicole approaches Florida
description: "The team reviewed the forecast and determined the rocket will remain at the pad."

title: Porsche unveils smaller, lighter, faster Formula E race car, the 99X
description: Formula E is getting a lot faster in 2023 with the introduction of a new race car.
